text:
This enhancement follows 50949 'Allow configuration of service name, AJP port, server port.'.

It'd be nice to have the ability to change also :
* service "human name" (as it appears in the Windows services console)
* service description

Since when several Tomcat instances are installed on a machine, we like to be able to distinguish them by their purpose so we give them according "human names".

Configuration of JVM arguments would also be a very nice feature (would allow activation of JMX / remote debug, etc.) and would save us the pain of updating registry manually afterwards.
creator: etienne.massip@gmail.com

text: All of these are editable via the tomcat7w.exe with no need for registry editing. There is a limit to how much configuration is practical during install and how much has to be done post install.
creator: markt@apache.org
